Auditors in DWC

Book A Free Consultation

Home

LICENSED EXTERNAL AUDITORS & AUDIT FIRM IN DWC, DUBAI UAE

A&A Associate is a DWC approved auditor that can work for you as an independent external auditing firm to provide shareholders, stakeholders and the free zone authority confidence that your business is being run efficiently and in full compliance with laws and regulations.
Our audit process is streamlined and prepared in a manner that complies with all applicable accounting standards and we are licensed by the UAE government and registered in the DWC free zone in order to provide independent external audit reports.

DUBAI WORLD CENTRAL

The Dubai World Central (DWC) also known as Dubai South is one of the fastest growing free zones in Dubai and the UAE. It is a strategic initiative that was launched by the Dubai government in 2006. The plan was to design a free zone to provide an economic platform to all industries and to create approximately 500,000 jobs in the process.

Dubai World Center takes advantage of its location and seamlessly connects the Jebel Ali Sea Port to the Al Maktoum International Airport by using Dubai Logistics Corridor. By doing so DWC is able to provide a multi model logistics platform showcasing unparalleled levels of connectivity, speed and efficiency.

The Dubai World Central like other free zones in the UAE has specific rules and regulations for businesses within the free zone. The purpose of these specific rules and regulations is to make sure that the free zone environment is well regulated and properly controlled.

TYPES OF COMPANIES IN DUBAI WORLD CENTRAL

In the DWC a Limited Liability Company or branch of a local or international company can be setup.

Types of Business License in Dubai World Center

  • Industrial License –allows the holder to perform specified light manufacturing activities.
  • Service License – permits the holder to provide specified services in the license within the DWC and in other parts of the UAE.
  • General Trading License –permits the holder to import, export, and store specific items mentioned in the license as well as sell these products in the UAE through a local distributor
  • Logistics License – permits the holder to perform specific logistic services mentioned on the license.
  • Education License – permits the holder to provide services relating to education in Dubai World Central and in other parts of the UAE.

Benefits associated with setting up business operations in DWC

  • Corporate tax exemption
  • Personal income tax exemption
  • 100% foreign ownership
  • No restrictions on repatriation of capital and profits
  • Secure and regulated environment
  • Exemption from all types of import and export duties
  • Excellent infrastructure and services

Benefits of external audit services in DWC

One of the key benefits associated with an external audit engagement is that it helps businesses operating within Dubai World Central to renew their DWC business license. Another benefit of an independent external audit report is that it provides the entity’s shareholders and other stakeholders with information as to whether the financial statements reflect a true and fair view of the company’s financial position and are prepared in compliance with applicable accounting standards and regulations.
The external audit report from an approved audit firm in DWC or Dubai also provides the free zone authority with information as to whether the company is complying with the rules and regulations applicable in the DWC free zone. The external audit report also helps in providing banks, investors and financial institutions with necessary information they need in order to assess the risk and impact of investing in a specific company in the Dubai south free zone.

How A&A Associate can assist your company?

A & A Associate is a leading audit firm that provides external audit services in Dubai World Central, mainland Dubai as well as other free zones in the UAE. We have a team of qualified professionals who have extensive auditing experience of companies in diverse business sectors and industries. Our objective is to provide our clients with audit services that are not only of exceptional quality but also adds value with in relation to their business operations.

A & A Associate also provide:

  • Auditor in DIFC
  • Auditor in JAFZA
  • Auditor in DWC
